page.title: 13HOME LIFE: POYNTINGTON (2)
page.content: {Gardening}is a major preoccupation and generally gardens are well maintained. Little paid help is available either for gardening or housework so these are usually shared by members of the household. {Pastimes:}Country walks,care of pets, golf,bridge,voluntary work,charitable coffee mornings,fetes,plant sales. About a quarter of the households have school age children with{transport provided to state schools.Parents using private schools tend to share the school runs.Baby sitting and limited pre_school activities are often arranged on a sharing basis. Shopping requires transport.Nearly all the households have one car and professional and farming families may have a second.Most households have washing machines and freezers,a few have microwave ovens and videos.
